definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 pl. [[מְלַחְנׇא]] Ezr 4:14 we have eaten the salt of the palace (so most), i.e. have assumed obligations of loyalty, cf. M:69* K:§ 71, 2 (and Syr. 0etmalah. be intimate with PS:2134); Str (after Nes:MM 30 f.) thinks n. c. sf.: our salt is the salt of the palace.
